dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3423 RH: FROST Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Wied introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
Additional sponsors: Ms. Scholten, Ms. Gillen, and Mr. Lawler
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on May 15, 2025

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to include aircraft deicing storage facilities in the definition of airport development, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Facility for Runway Operations and Safe Transportation Act or the FROST Act.
Section 47102(3)(B)(v) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by striking and storage facilities for the equipment and fluids.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
